detailsSection:
Download the appropriate worksheet for the SharePoint hybrid topology that you want to deploy. We’ve provided both an Excel and Word version for each SharePoint hybrid topology.

Warning: For security reasons, make sure that you store the worksheet in a secure place such as a secured file share or SharePoint document library and only grant permissions to administrators who are involved in the deployment process and must know this information.

SharePoint Hybrid worksheet for a one-way outbound authentication topology.xlsx

SharePoint Hybrid worksheet for a one-way outbound authentication topology.doc
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
  • The file is a Microsoft Excel document. Users who do not have Microsoft Excel can view this document through the downloadable Excel Viewer.
installInstructionSection: 1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
